attributes.action: review the current honours systems and to not honour David Beckham with a knighthood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The honours system has lost all it's sense of honour as it now driven by celebrity and not by acheivement.  David Beckham does not deserve a knighthood for kicking a football around a field and this travesty must be stopped.  The honours system must be reviewed now in order to stop the honours system sliding into irrelevance and an object of derision.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
